COMPANY_NAME.description: Legal name of the disclosing party/company

RECIPIENT_NAME.description: Legal name of the receiving party/recipient

PURPOSE_DESCRIPTION.description: Specific purpose for disclosure of confidential information
PURPOSE_DESCRIPTION.example: evaluating a potential investment in Company

STANDSTILL_DURATION.description: Duration of standstill period in months

OWNERSHIP_THRESHOLD_PERCENTAGE.description: Maximum percentage of securities that can be acquired

GOVERNING_LAW.description: Complete governing law clause - jurisdiction-specific variants available
GOVERNING_LAW.example: the laws of the State of Delaware, without regard to its conflicts of law principles
GOVERNING_LAW.usage: Base governing law clause - use jurisdiction overrides for specific territories

GOVERNING_LAW_STATE.description: State whose laws govern the agreement (US only)

ARBITRATION_CITY.description: City where arbitration will be held

SURVIVAL_PERIOD_YEARS.description: Years confidentiality obligations survive after termination

BREACH_NOTIFICATION_HOURS.description: Hours within which breach must be reported

NON_SOLICIT_DURATION_YEARS.description: Duration of non-solicitation restriction in years

formatting_rules.consistency: Same placeholder used across all variants
formatting_rules.reusability: Placeholders in dictionary can be reused across different agreements
formatting_rules.no_inline_prose: Never use descriptive prose like 'describe specific purpose' - use placeholder names only
